hibernate-mapping.query:
select rateInfo.Rate from PFMORM00074 as rateInfo where rateInfo.CurrencyCode = :currencyCode and rateInfo.RateType = :rateType and
rateInfo.LastModify = 1 and rateInfo.ToCurrencyCode = :homeCur and rateInfo.Active = true
select new rateInfoDto( r.Id,r.Rate,r.DenoRate ) from PFMORM00074 as r where r.CurrencyCode =: cur and r.RateType =: rateType and r.ToCurrencyCode =: toCur and r.Active = true and r.LastModify = true

select new rateInfoDto( r.Id, r.CurrencyCode, r.RateType, r.Rate, r.DenoRate, r.RegisterDate, r.LastModify, r.ToCurrencyCode, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedUserId, r.CreatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate ) from PFMORM00074 as r where r.Active = true and r.LastModify = true order by r.RegisterDate desc

select new rateInfoDto( r.Id, r.CurrencyCode, r.RateType, r.Rate, r.DenoRate, r.RegisterDate, r.LastModify, r.ToCurrencyCode, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedUserId, r.CreatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate ) from PFMORM00074 as r where r.Id = :id and r.Active = true

select new rateInfoDto( rateInfo.Rate, rateInfo.DenoRate) from PFMORM00074 as rateInfo where rateInfo.CurrencyCode = :currencyCode and rateInfo.RateType = :rateType and
rateInfo.LastModify = 1 and rateInfo.ToCurrencyCode = :homeCur and rateInfo.Active = 1

select rateInfo.DenoRate from PFMORM00074 as rateInfo where rateInfo.CurrencyCode = :currencyCode and rateInfo.RateType = :rateType and rateInfo.ToCurrencyCode = :ToCur and YEAR(rateInfo.RegisterDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) and MONTH(rateInfo.RegisterDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) and DAY(rateInfo.RegisterDate) = DAY(CURRENT_DATE) and rateInfo.LastModify = 1 and rateInfo.Active = true

select new rateInfoDto( r.Id, r.CurrencyCode, r.RateType, r.Rate, r.DenoRate, r.RegisterDate, r.LastModify, r.ToCurrencyCode, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedUserId, r.CreatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate ) from PFMORM00074 as r where r.Active = true and r.LastModify = 1
update PFMORM00074 r set r.LastModify = 0 , r.UpdatedUserId = :updateduserid , r.UpdatedDate = :updateddate where r.Active = true and r.LastModify = 1

select rateInfo.Rate from PFMORM00074 as rateInfo where rateInfo.CurrencyCode = :currencyCode and rateInfo.RateType = :rateType and convert(char(10),rateInfo.RegisterDate,111) = convert(char(10),:currentDate,111) and rateInfo.LastModify = 1 and rateInfo.Active = 1
select new rateInfoDto ( MAX(r.Id) ) from PFMORM00074 as r
